comment: I didn't like the platform that was used for the assignments. You have to pay $80 to access the material. Easy material, just a lot of busy work. Assignments are due every 2 weeks, and if you miss it you cannot get any points for turning it in late. She offers multiple opportunities for extra credit though.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Troccoli is extremely helpful in this course. She uses a different platform from D2L but it looks the exact same and is super easy to navigate. No tests, just end of unit review sheets and there are quizzes but they are open note no lockdown. This class is so easy and I completed it a month early because you can work ahead. Easy A!

For this class, you have to be very interactive but the Prof Trocolli makes it so easy. As long as you make sure to read and make an effort with homework this class will be smooth. This class is not hard whatsoever and has a lot of information that could help impact your life positively.

Professor Trocolli is a very caring professor, and she takes in every student like we are her own children. Offers extra credit at end of semester and is understanding of assignment deadline issues. Very sweet lady that also tells funny stories.

Very easy class. As others have said, just show up and complete the work (which is a breeze) and you will get an A. Professor Trocolli also offered extra credit at the end of the course for those who had missed assignments.
if you show up & do the work its an easy A. its almost impossible to fail the class unless you simply dont try. 10/10 professor forsure!

Professor Trocolli was a very sweet teacher. She is very comforting and answers any questions you may have quickly. She gives assignments online that are usually due within a 2 week period. As long as you do the work you will get an A. She does have mandatory attendance, and participation is a grade.

This class is ridiculously easy without a doubt. Minimal effort to make an A. And theres no tests! Attendance is required but I always worked on homework for other classes during this class. Take her.

TAKE THIS CLASS. Easy A. Textbook in online and you can work ahead. You don't have to go to class but attendance is part of your grade. Offers so many extra credits opportunities. No tests either. You'd have t try to fail this class. Cool person too. She has a bunch of great stories from when she was in the medical field.

Shannon was such a sweet teacher! Out of the whole class, only 3 of us actually went to class, but it definitely isn't necessary to. Easier A ever. All assignments are online and take maybe 5 minutes to complete each. No tests either.
